import React from "react"; import { BsPlayCircleFill as Play, BsFillPauseCircleFill as Pause, } from "react-icons/bs"; import { BiSkipNext as Next, BiSkipPrevious as Prev } from "react-icons/bi"; const AudioControls = ({ isPlaying, onPlayPauseClick, onPrevClick, onNextClick, showNextButton, changeSpeed, }) => (
{isPlaying ? ( ) : ( )}
); export default AudioControls;
